quest1

Class PerishableProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • quest1.Product
      • quest1.PerishableProduct
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chocolate, Pizza, Soda

    public class PerishableProduct
extends Product
    Class to represent a perishable product. The class fields are validity and genre.
    Version:
    23.08.2017
    Author:
    Shirley Ohara Telemaco de Freitas (shirleyohara@ufrn.edu.br)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Method to build a object of the class Perishable Product.

      • PerishableProduct

        public PerishableProduct(int id,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         double price,
                         java.lang.String trademark,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.util.Date manufactureDate,
                         java.util.Date validity,
                         java.lang.String genre)
        Method to build a object of the class Perishable Product. It receives seven parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - int - Parameter that represents the product id
        name - String - Parameter that represents the product name
        price - double - Parameter that represents the product price
        trademark - String - Parameter that represents the product trademark
        description - String - Parameter that represents the product description
        manufactureDate - Date - Parameter that represents the manufacture date of the product
        validity - Date - Parameter that represents the validity date of the perishable product.
        genre - String - Parameter that represents the genre of the perishable product.
